Name:

autobiographical memory, prospection and 
theory of mind reasoning tasks

Name: Classification learning
ReferencesAndLinks: Aron, A.R., Gluck, M.A., Poldrack, R.A. (2006). Long-term test-retest reliability of functional MRI in a classification learning task. Neuroimage, 29(3):1000-6
